popupInfoBlockedKeyword.message: 該關鍵詞在中國被屏蔽
popupInfoBlockedKeyword.description: Popup: Your search keyword is blocked in mainland China

popupServerInfoFail.message: 所有服務器均無法訪問此網站。該站很有可能在中國被屏蔽。
popupServerInfoFail.description: Popup: No servers were able to reach your site. This means that your site is most likely NOT accessible from within mainland China.

popupServerInfoOk.message: 所有服務器均可以訪問此網站。在中國可以訪問此網站。
popupServerInfoOk.description: Popup: All servers were able to reach this site. It should be accessible from within mainland China.
